bro Sneddon is a G, realtest prof out there honestly i had a blast in her class. very kind and understanding person.  top 3 profs all time. great sense of humor, id take her class again if i didnt graduate 

professor sneddon ik ur reading this, youre a real one, never change
She is a caring professor. When compared with other professors, she is definitely dedicated into teaching. Hopefully I can take more her courses in the future! :)

Fascinated by true crime or mysteries? This is the course for you. I rarely wake up before 1 pm and willing woke up for an 8:30 class because of how interesting and engaging Dr. Sneddon was. She takes morbid and macabre topics and frames them to explain how forensics can provide closure. Also, LITERALLY the only group project I have ever enjoyed.

She is nice, but an unfair grader. She always focuses on minor assignment details rather than the conceptual knowledge. People can receive special arrangements every time, but it's completely unfair to others. Everyone needs to consider the challenges they might face in the upcoming semester before deciding whether to take the course, right?

Dr. Sneddon loves teaching MBB 463, and that is clear. The course was outlined clearly and she was clear what was expected of us from the get go. My only comments on why this course wasn't amazing, is the exams seemed to be full of questions that were either confusing, or not entirely fair. The learning objectives were sometimes vague too.

One of the best MBB classes I have taken at SFU. Dr. Sneddon really cares for her students. Her lectures were clear and informative. When something didn't make sense, she would be open to clarify through email. She also takes students feedback seriously and makes an effort to change any issues. She also created unique cases for the class project!

Sophie was definitely one of the highlights of my whole undergrad. Despite being an 8:30am online class, she made lecture super welcoming. Very fair with marking, and genuinely wants students to do well. Exams are fair. She has rebranded this course from scratch and her thoughtfulness, enthusiasm & passion was evident in the group project/paper.

The most amazing prof of my entire undergrad! Definitely take a class with her if you can! Even though I took this course during COVID (as so it was delivered remotely) I had a wonderful time. Dr. Sneddon is amazing and you wont regret it.

Personable, professional prof that has an acute understanding of the material that she teaches, and clearly has a passion for it as well. Going to class is not a chore, as participation is always encouraged, and helps you to understand the course better. I've NEVER said that the highlight of a course was the group project, but here it was.

Despite the course being online, Dr. Sneddon did a fantastic job of teaching the course. Lectures were very engaging and fostered interest in forensic genomics. She had a clear grading criteria for each assignment and was very approachable for questions! I would definitely recommend taking this course with Dr. Sneddon when it is offered next.

Dr. Sneddon is an amazing prof! She was a huge help in the transition to online learning, and was so understanding about how difficult it was. She's so passionate about the course and her experience in forensics really shows! She cares about each and every one of her students, and we'd have loved to have an in-person class with her.
